short_description: India, a vibrant and diverse nation in South Asia, is known for its rich history, cultural tapestry, and a rapidly growing economy. Home to iconic landmarks like the Taj Mahal, it embraces a multitude of languages, religions, and traditions, creating a unique mosaic of unity in diversity.

alcohol_info: Purchase age is 18 in Goa, Himachal Pradesh, Karnataka, Sikkim, and Puducherry

Purchase age is 21 in Andhra Pradesh, Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Chhattisgarsh, Jammu and Kashmir, Jharkhand, Kerala, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashta, Mizoram, Orissa (Odisha), Rajasthan, Tamil Nadu, Telandana, Tripura, Uttarakhad, Uttar Pradesh, West Bengal and Delhi
Purchase age is 25 in Haryna
Maghalaya, Punjab
Cunsumption of alcohol is prohibited in the states of Bihar, Gujart, Lakshadweep, Maripur, and Nagaland

tipping.hotels: Tip porters 20-50 rupees per bag and a small gratuity to housekeeping is also appreciated
tipping.guides: Aim for 100-300 rupees per day for a private tour and 30-50 rupees for a group tour
tipping.restaurants: Larger restaurants should include gratuity but if not add 10% to your bill
tipping.Taxis: Taxi drivers don't expect tips but you can round up the fare as a kind gesture

weather.title: India experiences a varied climate ranging from tropical in the south to more temperate in the north. With distinct seasons like monsoon rains in summer and cooler temperatures in winter, the weather showcases the country's geographical diversity, offering everything from snow-capped mountains in the north to sun-soaked beaches in the south.

when_to_visit.title: Mountain exploration
when_to_visit.short_description: Mountainous areas in the north experience freezing winter weather, making summer the best time for visiting region

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.short_description: Most parts of India experiance pleasant and mild weather during this period. Great time to explore cities like Delhi, Jaipur and Mumbai as well as cultural sites like Taj Mahal

when_to_visit.title: Rainy season
when_to_visit.short_description: Increased rainfall and humidity. June and July are the wettest months in this period

weather.best_time: The best time to visit India depends on the region, but generally, the months of October to March offer pleasant temperatures and lower chances of rainfall in most parts of the country

short_description: China, the world's most populous nation, boasts a rich tapestry of ancient history and modern progress. With a diverse landscape encompassing the Great Wall, bustling cities like Beijing and Shanghai, and a thriving economy, China stands as a global powerhouse with a unique blend of tradition and innovation.

national_day.title: National Day of the People's Republic of China

tipping.hotels: Tipping is not required or expected in hotels
tipping.guides: Tours guides are rare case where tipping is expected at USD 10 per person
tipping.restaurants: Most restaurants refuse tips but some high end restaurants may add 10-15% service charge
tipping.Taxis: Drivers won't expect nor ask for a tip

weather.title: China has a diverse climate due to its vast size and varied topography. Generally, it experiences cold and dry winters in the north, while the south has a subtropical to tropical climate with hot and humid summers

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (April to May) Autumn (September to October)
when_to_visit.short_description: China has a diverse climate due to its vast size and varied topography. Generally, it experiences cold and dry winters in the north, while the south has a subtropical to tropical climate with hot and humid summers

when_to_visit.title: Peach blossom season
when_to_visit.short_description: Experience thousands of peach blossoms in bloom around the time of Chinese New Year

when_to_visit.title: Peak season
when_to_visit.short_description: Can be hot and humid in many parts of China, particularly in southern regions. Expect crowds during this period for sites such as the Great Wall, Yangtze River and Zhangjiajie National Forest Park

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Can get particularly cold in northern provincs like Beijing and Harbin. Great time to experience winter activities like skiing in Yabuli or ice sculptures at the Harbin Ice and Snow Festival

weather.best_time: The best time to visit China is during spring  (April to May) and autumn  (September to October) when the weather is pleasant, and you can avoid extreme temperatures and crowds

short_description: Embark on a road trip of a lifetime in the United States of America, where diverse landscapes, iconic landmarks, and vibrant culture await. Drive the iconic Route 66, visit the stunning national parks like Yellowstone and Grand Canyon, or explore the bustling cities like New York and Los Angeles

alcohol_info: The National Minimum Drinking Age Act(established in 1984) requires all states and territorites to have a minimum purchasing age of 21
Only two U. S. Territorites have a drinking age of 18, those being Puerto Rico and the U. S. Virgin Islands
Some states do not allow those under the legal drinking age to be present in liquor stores or in bars

tipping.hotels: Tipping at hotels is expected, aim for USD 1-2 per bag for porters, USD 2-3 per night for housekeeping and 15% for any room service
tipping.guides: You are expected to tip your tour guide, between 15% and 20% depending on the quality of service, friendliness and knowledge
tipping.restaurants: You should always tip between 10-25% at restaurants in America according to the level of service
tipping.Taxis: It's customary to tip your driver a 10-15% of the overall fare or round the amount to the nearest dollar

short_description: With over 17,000 islands, Indonesia is a destination that offers something for everyone. Explore the ancient temples of Bali, dive into the stunning coral reefs of Raja Ampat, and indulge in the delicious local cuisine

alcohol_info: Alcohol is prohibited in Aceh and Papua

tipping.hotels: Tipping is never mandatory as the hotels charge a 21% tax but you can offer a small gratuity to works if you see fit
tipping.guides: You are not obligated to tip your tour guides in Indonesia but a small gratuity will always be appreciated
tipping.restaurants: Check if your bill includes a service charge. If not you can add around 10% to your bill
tipping.Taxis: Taxis are metered but many people tip to the nearest Rp

weather.title: Indonesia has a tropical climate with high temperatures and humidity year-round. It experiences a wet season from October to April, with heavy rainfall, and a dry season from May to September, characterized by drier conditions

when_to_visit.title: Off peak season
when_to_visit.time_period: April and May, September and October
when_to_visit.short_description: Shoulder seasons offer favorable weather but with fewer crowds than the peak of dry season between June and August

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.short_description: Less rainfall, lower humidity and more sunshine. Perfect for outdoor activities and beaches across key destinations like Bali, Yogyakarta and Komodo Island. Note that June to August are the most crowded peak months

when_to_visit.title: Rainy season
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher humidity and frequent rain showers, occuring in bursts. Travel still possible during this period but be prepared for disruption

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Indonesia is during the dry season from April to October when you can enjoy sunny weather, calm seas for diving, and easier access to various island and cultural sites

short_description: With a rich history, stunning landscapes, and hospitable people, Pakistan offers a unique blend of adventure and culture. From the ancient ruins of Mohenjo-Daro to the majestic mountains of the Himalayas, there's no shortage of experiences to discover

alcohol_info: Prohibited for Muslims
Purchase age for Non-Muslims is 21

tipping.hotels: Government tax of 17.5% is usually applied to hotels but you can tip staff 30-40 rupees additional for their services
tipping.guides: Tip your guide 200-300 rupees per day for a private tour or 30-50 rupees for a group tour
tipping.restaurants: High end restaurants add 10% service charge to bills and in other restaurants you can tip 30-50 rupees
tipping.taxis: Tipping isn't expected but 20-30 rupees if the driver was helpful would be appreciated

weather.title: Pakistan has a varied climate due to its diverse topography. The northern regions have a temperate and alpine climate with cold winters and mild summers. The southern and coastal areas have a hot desert climate with low rainfall

when_to_visit.title: Best of hiking
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild, dry and pleasant weather, making it perfect for trekking and enjoying natural areas like Hunza and Swat Valley

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Hot weather with monsoon rains in July and August. Humidity is increased during this period

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Cool and dry but never too cold. Some heavy but short rain showers during this period

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Pakistan depends on the region, but generally, the spring months of March to May and the autumn months of September to November offer mild temperatures and ideal weather for trekking, mountaineering, and exploring cultural sites

short_description: Africa's most populous country is a vibrant and colorful destination, with a rich cultural heritage and bustling cities. Visit the UNESCO-listed Osun-Osogbo Sacred Grove, explore the markets of Lagos, and relax on the beaches of Lagos Island

tipping.hotels: None
tipping.guides: None
tipping.restaurants: None
tipping.taxis: None

weather.title: Nigeria has a tropical climate with high temperatures and humidity year-round. It experiences a wet season from April to October, with heavy rainfall, while the dry season from November to March offers drier conditions

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.short_description: Cooler temperatures and less rainfall. Most enjoyable period for sightseeing and outdoor adventures

when_to_visit.title: Wet season
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher temperatures, high humidity, and heavy rainfall. Most frequent thunderstorms happen between June and September

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Nigeria depends on the region, but generally, the months of November to March offer milder temperatures and lower chances of rainfall, making it suitable for exploring the country's cultural heritage and wildlife reserves

short_description: From the vibrant cities of Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo to the stunning Amazon rainforest and the beaches of Bahia, Brazil is a country of contrasts and wonders. Dance to samba music, indulge in delicious food, and experience the warmth and hospitality of the Brazilian people

alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve or supply any alcohol beverage to a person under 18 years of age. The presidential law enacted on 17 March 2015 made any violation of the law a criminal offence

Any adult person selling, serving, giving or supplying alcohol beverages to a minor is punished with imprisonment of 2 to 4 years, a fine of R$3.000 to R$10.000 and a ban to operate any business selling or serving alcohol

tipping.hotels: None
tipping.guides: None
tipping.restaurants: None
tipping.taxis: None

weather.title: Brazil has a diverse climate due to its vast size and geographical features. It generally experiences a tropical climate, with variations across different regions, including hot and humid conditions in the Amazon rainforest, pleasant coastal temperatures, and a subtropical climate in the southern regions

when_to_visit.title: Party time
when_to_visit.short_description: Peak summer season with warm temperatures and major celebration from New Year to Carnival

when_to_visit.title: Southeastern region
when_to_visit.time_period: April to June, Aughust to October
when_to_visit.short_description: Shoulder seasons offer more comfortable temperatures, less humidity and less crowds than summer months. Ideal for exploring citis like Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo

when_to_visit.title: Northeastern regions
when_to_visit.short_description: Dry season in coastal areas such Selvador and Fortaleza. This period offers plenty of sunshine, warm temperatures and less rain

when_to_visit.title: For nature lovers
when_to_visit.time_period: Amazon (June to November), Pantanal wetlands (April to September)
when_to_visit.short_description: Both the Amazon and Pantanal wetlands remain hot and humid during these periods but water levels are lower, making wildlife discovery and navigation easier

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Brazil is during the months of April to June and August to October, when many regions experience milder temperatures, lower humidity, and less rainfall, offering favorable conditions for outdoor activities and sightseeing

short_description: Experience the vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and delicious cuisine of Bangladesh, a country with a rich history and welcoming people. Visit bustling markets, explore ancient temples, and relax on beautiful beaches

tipping.hotels: Tipping hotel staff isn't customary but you can give 20-30 rupees as a gesture to porters or housekeeping
tipping.guides: Tipping tour guides is not a custom but a kind gesture. For a full day privatetour tip 100-200 rupees and 30-50 rupees for a group tour
tipping.restaurants: Tip 5-10% of the bill where service charge isn't included
tipping.taxis: Most taxis use a meter and you can simply round up the fare

weather.title: Bangladesh has a subtropical monsoon climate characterized by hot, humid summers (March to June) and cooler, drier winters (November to February). The country experiences heavy rainfall during the monsoon season (June to October) and occasional cyclones, while the spring (March to May) brings higher temperatures and humidity

when_to_visit.title: For nature lovers
when_to_visit.short_description: Nature is in full bloom and it's the perfect time if you are interested in observing wildlife or birdwatching

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.short_description: Best time to visit with a pleasant climate for sightseeing and enjoying the country's natural beauty. Lowest rainfall and humidity in this period

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher temperatures, humidity and the possibility of heavy rainfall

when_to_visit.title: Monsoon season
when_to_visit.short_description: Frequent rain showers and occasional cyclones

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Bangladesh is during the winter season (November to February) when the weather is cooler and drier, providing comfortable conditions for exploring the country's attractions and enjoying outdoor activities

short_description: The largest country in the world, Russia offers a wealth of cultural and historical treasures. Marvel at the colorful onion domes of St. Basil's Cathedral in Moscow, visit the Hermitage Museum in St. Petersburg, or journey on the Trans-Siberian Railway

alcohol_info: Penalties apply to parents of those under 16 years of age who consume alcohol beverages in public places

tipping.hotels: Tipping is common in hotels so aim for 30-90 Rubbles for porters, 60-120 Rubbles per day for housekeeping and 300 Rubbles for concierge
tipping.guides: Tip up to 300 Rubbles to the guide and/or driver direcltly
tipping.restaurants: It is customary to tip 10-15% of the bill in cash
tipping.taxis: You can round up the fare or tip no more that 10%

weather.title: Russia has a diverse climate due to its vast size and varied topography. The European part has a range of climates, including humid continental and subarctic. Siberia has a severe continental climate with extremely cold winters. The country experiences significant temperature variations and varied precipitation patterns

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (April to May), Autumn (September to October)
when_to_visit.short_description: Shoulder seasons offer warm weather without the crowds of summer. Perfect time to visit tourist hotspots like Moscow and St Petersburg

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm temperatures and busy with tourists. Great opportunity to visit some of Russia's less known areas on the Black Sea, in Siberia and the Far East

when_to_visit.title: White Nights
when_to_visit.short_description: Visit St Petersburg in July to enjoy the annual festival where the skies remain light all day for two days

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Following the wet months of October and November, winter is often cold and harsh. Avoid remote northern regions during this period unless necessary

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Russia depends on the region and activities you plan to engage in. Generally, the summer months from June to August offer milder temperatures, longer daylight hours, and access to cultural and natural attractions

short_description: Mexico is a country of vibrant colors, delicious cuisine, and fascinating history. Explore the ancient ruins of Chichen Itza, swim in the crystal-clear waters of the cenotes, and indulge in delicious tacos al pastor. Visit the bustling capital of Mexico City for a taste of modern Mexican culture and art

alcohol_info: The minimum age to buy and consume alcohol beverages is regulated by each state of Mexico. But all states have set a minimum age of 18 years, and in no state is it legal for minors to buy and consume alcohol

tipping.hotels: You are expected to tip your porter 10-20 pesos per bag and 20-25 persos per night to housekeeping
tipping.guides: Tips are exepcted. For large tours tip 50-70 pesos per person and for smaller tours aim for 15% of the cost
tipping.restaurants: If service is great, tip 10-15% in cash to restaurant staff
tipping.taxis: Tipping taxi drivers is not required

weather.title: Mexico has a diverse climate due to its size and topography. The coastal regions have a tropical climate, while the central highlands have a temperate climate. The northern regions have a desert climate, and the southern regions have a tropical rainforest climate

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.short_description: Lower rainfall and more comfortable temperatures, making it ideal for outdoor activities, exploring cultural sites, and enjoying the country's beautiful beaches

when_to_visit.title: Spring break
when_to_visit.short_description: US partygoers flock to Cancun, Los Cabos and the Riviera Maya during this period. Avoid if you are keen on a quieter and less expensive trip

when_to_visit.title: Wet season
when_to_visit.short_description: The best time to visit Mexico depends on the region, but generally, the months of December to April offer pleasant temperatures, lower chances of rainfall, and ideal conditions for exploring cultural sites and beach destinations

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Mexico depends on the region, but generally, the months of December to April offer pleasant temperatures, lower chances of rainfall, and ideal conditions for exploring cultural sites and beach destinations

short_description: A land of ancient history and breathtaking landscapes, Ethiopia is a country that has something for everyone. Explore the stunning Simien Mountains, discover the ancient ruins of Aksum, and immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of Addis Ababa

weather.title: Ethiopia has a diverse climate due to its varying topography, with a mix of tropical, subtropical, and highland climates. The country experiences two main seasons: a dry season from October to May, characterized by cooler temperatures and minimal rainfall, and a rainy season from June to September, when higher temperatures and significant rainfall are more common

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.short_description: Cooler temperatures, minimal rainfall, and optimal conditions for exploring highlights like Addis Ababa and the Simien Mountains

when_to_visit.title: Wet season
when_to_visit.short_description: Heavy rainfall particularly in the highlands and central regions. Some roads and remote areas may be inaccessible during this season

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Ethiopia is during the dry season from October to May when the weather is generally mild and pleasant, allowing for comfortable exploration of the country's historical sites, diverse landscapes, and vibrant cultural events

short_description: A land of contrasts, Japan offers a unique travel experience that blends ancient traditions with modern innovation. Explore the bustling streets of Tokyo, soak in the natural hot springs of Hakone, and indulge in the fresh flavors of Japanese cuisine, from sushi to ramen. Don't miss the chance to witness the stunning cherry blossom season.

tipping.hotels: Only tip in very high end hotels and offer a small amount discretely in an envelope not directly
tipping.guides: You can tip your tour guide, but it isn't mandatory, or expected
tipping.restaurants: Tipping is uncommon as the pricing is supposed to already reflect the service quality
tipping.taxis: You don't need to tip your taxi driver in Japan

weather.title: Japan has a varied climate due to its geographical location. The northern regions have a humid continental climate with cold winters and warm summers, while the southern regions have a subtropical climate with mild winters and hot, humid summers. It experiences a rainy season, known as 'tsuyu,' in June and July

when_to_visit.title: Cherry blossom season
when_to_visit.short_description: Cherry trees bloom with beautiful pink and white flowers every Spring. Weather is mild and pleasant, drawing crowds to witness the season in cities like Tokyo, Kyoto and Hiroshima

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Hot and humid, especially in central and southern regions. Can also be rainy with frequent showers and occasional typhoons. Good time to visit Hokkaido in the north where the weather is cooler

when_to_visit.title: For winter sport
when_to_visit.short_description: Colder temperatures and snowfall in northern regions, perfect for skiing and snowboarding

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Spring and autumn are considered the best times to visit with mild and pleasant temperatures. Great to experience changing colors in Japan

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Japan depends on the region, but generally, the months of March to May and September to November offer pleasant temperatures and beautiful cherry blossom or autumn foliage views

short_description: The Philippines is a tropical paradise, with its pristine beaches, crystal-clear waters, and stunning coral reefs. Explore the vibrant capital city of Manila, island-hop in Palawan, and learn about the unique culture and traditions of the Filipino people

alcohol_info: Minors (defined as under 18 years old) are prohibited to purchase alcohol and adults are prohibited to purchase or provide alcohol to minors. Minors are not prohibited to consume alcohol

tipping.hotels: Tipping is relatively uncommon in the Philippines but you can always tip individual staff for exceptional service
tipping.guides: Guides will typically appreciate a 10% tip
tipping.restaurants: Check your bill for 'SC' service charge applied and if not add 10% to your bill
tipping.Taxis: Tip 10% for good service on a metered ride but do not tip for a negotiated fare

weather.title: The Philippines has a tropical climate with high temperatures and humidity year-round. It experiences a wet season from June to October, with increased rainfall and the possibility of typhoons, while the dry season from November to May offers drier conditions

when_to_visit.title: Best for beaches
when_to_visit.short_description: Weather is typically sunny, with less rainfall and lower humidity. Considered the best time to visit many popular beach destinations such as Boracay, Palawan, Cebu, and Bohol

when_to_visit.title: Peak seaon
when_to_visit.short_description: Christmas season and Easter holidays are peak travel times, so expect larger crowds and higher prices during these periods

when_to_visit.title: Wet season
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher humidity and more frequent rainfall but can still be a great time for nature activities and less crowds

when_to_visit.title: Risk of typhoons
when_to_visit.short_description: The peak of typhoon risk during the wet season occurs between July and October

weather.best_time: The best time to visit the Philippines depends on the region, but generally, the months of December to April offer dry and sunny weather, making it ideal for beach activities and exploring the country's stunning islands

short_description: A country steeped in history and mystery, Egypt offers travelers the chance to explore ancient ruins, sail along the Nile River, and discover the treasures of the Pharaohs. Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of Cairo, marvel at the awe-inspiring pyramids of Giza, and discover the secrets of Luxor

tipping.hotels: In Egypt you will be expected to tip anyone in your hotel who assists you. Tip EGP 3-5 per bag to porters and EGP 5-10 per night for housekeeping
tipping.guides: Tip guides EGP 80-100 for a full day and EGP 40-50 for a half day
tipping.restaurants: Generally tipping around 10% is good etiquette at a restaurant in Egypt
tipping.taxis: In Egypt it is not customary to tip taxi drivers

weather.title: Egypt has a desert climate, characterized by hot and arid conditions with minimal rainfall. Summers are extremely hot, while winters are generally mild and cooler, particularly in the northern regions

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.short_description: Milder temperatures and lower humidity make it more comfortable to visit iconic attractions like the Pyramids, Luxor and Aswan

when_to_visit.title: Diving in the Red Sea
when_to_visit.short_description: Winter is an ideal time to explore the Red Sea cost including popular beach areas like Hurghada and Sharm El-Sheikh. Note that tourism in this region peaks in December and January

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Scorching temperatures and high humidity make this a challenging time to visit the country

when_to_visit.title: Off peak season
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to October)
when_to_visit.short_description: Shoulder seasons offer mild temperatures and fewer crowds

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Egypt is during the winter months from November to February when the weather is milder and more comfortable for exploring the ancient sites and attractions, such as the pyramids, without the intense heat of the summer months

short_description: Embark on an adventure to the Democratic Republic of the Congo, a country that is home to incredible wildlife and stunning natural wonders. Go gorilla watching in the rainforest, hike through the Virunga Mountains, and witness the country's unique geological formations

tipping.hotels: None
tipping.guides: None
tipping.restaurants: None
tipping.taxis: None

weather.title: The Democratic Republic of the Congo has a tropical climate with high temperatures and high humidity throughout the year. It experiences two main seasons: a wet season, from October to May, characterized by heavy rainfall, and a dry season, from June to September, with reduced rainfall and slightly cooler temperatures

when_to_visit.title: Gorilla trekking
when_to_visit.short_description: Drier terrain in the famous Virunga National Park makes tracking and hiking mountain gorillas most accessible during this period

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.short_description: Less rainfall, milder temperatures and better conditions to enjoy the country's natural areas such as Kahuzi-Biega National Park and Garamba National Park

when_to_visit.title: Rainy season
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher rainfall, increased humidity and frequent rain showers. Expect travel disruption and some areas will become inaccesible

weather.best_time: The best time to visit the Democratic Republic of the Congo is during the dry season from June to September when the weather is generally drier and more suitable for exploring the country's natural wonders and wildlife, such as Virunga National Park and the Congo River

short_description: Immerse yourself in the captivating culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning natural beauty of Vietnam, where ancient temples, bustling cities, and pristine beaches await. Visit the ancient city of Hoi An, indulge in the street food of Hanoi, or explore the stunning landscapes of Halong Bay

tipping.hotels: Tipping at hotels depends on the quality of service. If you receive good service, tip USD 1-2 per bag to the porter and USD 1-2 per day to housekipping
tipping.guides: Guides rely on tips so aim for USD 3-4 per day per person for private tours
tipping.restaurants: Check if service charge is added and if not, add 5-10% tip in cash for the waiting staff
tipping.taxis: If your taxi driver is polite and friendly, offer a small tip of a few dollars equivalent

weather.title: Vietnam has a varied climate due to its size and diverse topography. The northern regions have a subtropical climate with four distinct seasons. The central regions have a tropical climate with high temperatures year-round. The southern regions have a tropical climate with a distinct wet and dry season

when_to_visit.title: Northern Vietnam
when_to_visit.short_description: Cool and dry weather, making it a great time to explore Hanoi, cruise in Halong Bay or explore the countryside of the north

when_to_visit.title: Central Vietnam
when_to_visit.short_description: Less rainfall and more sunny days. Ideal conditions to explore destinations like Hoi An, Danang, and Hue

when_to_visit.title: Southern Vietnam
when_to_visit.short_description: Dry and warm weather, making it perfect to explore bustling cities like Ho Chi Ming city or escape to the Mekong Delta or Phu Quoc Island

when_to_visit.title: Typhoon season
when_to_visit.short_description: Tropical storms and typhoons are most likely to occur during this period. Stay updated on weather to plan accordingly

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Vietnam depends on the region, but generally, the months of October to April offer pleasant temperatures, lower chances of rainfall, and ideal conditions for exploring cultural sites, enjoying outdoor activities, and cruising in Halong Bay

short_description: A land of ancient history, stunning architecture, and vibrant culture, Iran is a destination that will leave you in awe. Explore the ancient city of Persepolis, indulge in the delicious local cuisine, and immerse yourself in the vibrant local traditions

alcohol_info: There is a ban on alcohol, but religious minorities may purchase small amounts from shops owned by the same religious minority

tipping.hotels: None
tipping.guides: None
tipping.restaurants: None
tipping.taxis: None

weather.title: Iran has a diverse climate due to its large size and varying topography. It ranges from arid and desert-like in the central regions to Mediterranean along the Caspian Sea coast. Summers are generally hot, while winters can be cold with snowfall in mountainous areas

when_to_visit.title: For historical sites
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild and pleasant weather, with blooming flowers and green landscapes. Perfect time to explore historical sites in places like Tehran, Isfahan and Shiraz

when_to_visit.title: Hiking
when_to_visit.short_description: Similarly mild and comfortable as spring. Great for outdoor hikes and nature exploration as autumn foilage emerges

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Extremely hot temperatures, particularly in central and southern parts of the country

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Colder temperatures, particularly in mountainous areas. Snowfall possible in some regions

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Iran is during the spring months of March to May and the autumn months of September to November when the weather is mild, and you can explore the country's historical sites comfortably

short_description: Indulge in the rich history, delicious cuisine, and stunning natural beauty of Turkey, where a blend of European and Middle Eastern cultures meet. Explore the ancient ruins of Ephesus, indulge in the culinary delights of Istanbul's Grand Bazaar, or relax on the beaches of Antalya

tipping.hotels: Is it customary to tip hotel staff, including 4-5 Lira per bag to porters, 15 Lira to the concierge and 5-10 Lira per day to housekeeping
tipping.guides: Tour guides don't work for tips but you can show appreciation with 10-15 Turkish Lirah
tipping.restaurants: Aim to tip 5-10% in cash, depending on the level of service
tipping.taxis: In Turkey it is not customary or expected to tip taxi drivers. You can round up the fare if you wish

weather.title: Turkey has a varied climate due to its diverse topography. Coastal regions have a Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters. Inland areas experience more continental climates, with hot summers and cold winters

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild temperatures, comfortable weather conditions, and less rainfall. Great time to visit popular destinations such as Istanbul, Cappadocia, and the Aegean and Mediterranean coastal regions

when_to_visit.title: Best for beaches
when_to_visit.short_description: Peak summer season offers warmer temperatures and crowds in popular beach destinations

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Milder temperatures, getting cooler the more inland you travel. Pleasant time to visit Istanbul and Cappadocia

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Turkey depends on the region and activities you plan to engage in, but generally, the months of April to June and September to October offer pleasant temperatures, fewer crowds, and ideal conditions for exploring historical sites and coastal areas

short_description: A country of rich history, culture, and stunning natural landscapes, Germany is a must-visit destination. Explore the vibrant capital city of Berlin, sample the world- famous beer in Munich, and marvel at the beauty of the Black Forest

alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve or supply fermented alcohol beverages (beer, wine, cider and sparkling wine) to anyone under 16 years of age
However this age limit drops down to 14 if a minor is accompanied by a parent or legal guardian
It is generally prohibited to serve, sell or supply any beverage containing spirits and foods containing spirits above negligible amounts, to anyone under the age of 18 years

tipping.hotels: Tipping is expected in hotels at around ‚Ç¨1-3 per bag to porters and ‚Ç¨3-5 per night to housekeeping
tipping.guides: It's common for tourists to give tips of 10% to tour guides in Germany
tipping.restaurants: A modest 5-10% gratuity is standard practice in Germany and be prepared to pay in cash
tipping.taxis: Tipping isn't necessary, but most round-up the fare to the nearest Euro

weather.title: Germany has a temperate seasonal climate with relatively mild summers and cool winters. The country experiences moderate rainfall throughout the year, with the coastal regions being influenced by maritime influences and the eastern regions having a more continental climate

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (May to June), Autumn (September to October)
when_to_visit.short_description: Generally mild weather with comfortable temperatures and longer daylight hours. Perfect for exploring popular cities like Berlin and Munich or picturesque landscapes in the Black Forest

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm weather and long days make it a popular time for tourists, leading to crowds in popular areas around beaches and lakes

when_to_visit.title: Festive spirit
when_to_visit.short_description: Colder temperatures, shorter daylight hours and the possibility of snowfall. It's an enchanting time to visit the country's Christmas markets or experience winter sports in the Bavarian Alps

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Germany is during the summer months from June to August when the weather is generally warm, festivals are in full swing, and you can explore the country's charming cities, picturesque countryside, and cultural attractions to the fullest

short_description: Experience the vibrant culture, stunning temples, and delicious food of Thailand, where bustling cities, tranquil beaches, and ancient ruins await. Visit the historic temples of Chiang Mai, indulge in the street food of Bangkok, or relax on the beaches of Phuket

national_day.title: Anniversary of Birthday H.M. King Phumiphon

tipping.hotels: Offer 20-50 baht tips to hotel staff members to show your appreciation
tipping.guides: Tip the equivalent of USD 10-20 per day for the tour guide
tipping.restaurants: Tip 10% in high end restaurant and leave change for street food or cheaper restaurants
tipping.taxis: Taxi drivers in Thailand will not expect you to tip, however most will round up the fare

weather.title: Thailand has a tropical climate with high temperatures and humidity year-round. It experiences a wet season from May to October, with increased rainfall, and a drier season from November to April. The country is known for its stunning beaches and vibrant cultural heritage

when_to_visit.title: Best for beaches
when_to_visit.short_description: Pleasant temperatures, lower humidity, and minimal rainfall. Great time to explore popular tourist destinations such as Bangkok, Chiang Mai, Phuket, and Krabi or enjoy beach activities with calmer seas

when_to_visit.title: Hot season
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher temperatures and humidity but still enjoyable for beach activities. Stay hydrated, seek shade, and take necessary precautions against the sun

when_to_visit.title: Rainy season
when_to_visit.short_description: Increased rainfall, humidity and occasional tropical storms. This period helps contribute to lush landscapes, vibrant flora and reduced crowds

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Thailand depends on the region, but generally, the months of November to February offer milder temperatures, lower chances of rainfall, and ideal conditions for beach activities and exploring cultural sites

short_description: Experience the rich history, stunning landscapes, and vibrant culture of the United Kingdom, where ancient castles, bustling cities, and charming countryside await. Visit the iconic landmarks of London, hike in the Scottish Highlands, or explore the charming towns of the Cotswolds

national_day.title: Official Birthday of King Charles III

alcohol_info: In England, Wales and Scotland, it is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages in licensed premises to anyone under the age of 18, but those aged 16-17 may consume wine, beer or cider on licensed premises when ordered with a meal and they are accompanied by an adult
In Northern Ireland, it is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Minors are prohibited to consume alcohol beverages in public

tipping.hotels: It is customary to tip porters ¬£1-2 per bag at high end hotels
tipping.guides: Tip your tour guide ¬£2-4 per person per day but no more than 10%
tipping.restaurants: A discretionary service charge between 10-20% is added to most restaurnt bills which you can choose whether to pay or not
tipping.taxis: Many round up the fare for convenience but you are not expected to tip

weather.title: The United Kingdom has a temperate maritime climate with mild summers and cool, wet winters. It experiences moderate rainfall throughout the year, with no distinct dry season

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Generally mild with landscapes in full color. Great opportunity for sightseeing but be aware there may be rain showers

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Warmer temperatures with longer daylight hours. Great time to visit popular destinations like London, Edinburgh and Stonehenge. Also be sure to enjoy the country's numerous festivals and countryside

when_to_visit.title: Festive vibes
when_to_visit.short_description: Cold and camp with shorter daylight hours. Still a great time to visit if you enjoy festive celebrations, Christmas markets, and winter activities like ice skating

weather.best_time: The best time to visit the UK depends on the region and activities you plan to engage in, but generally, the summer months from June to August offer milder temperatures, longer daylight hours, and various cultural events and festivals

short_description: Embark on a safari adventure and discover the stunning wildlife and natural beauty of Tanzania, with its iconic savannahs, towering mountains, and pristine beaches. Spot the Big Five in the Serengeti, hike to the summit of Mount Kilimanjaro, or relax on the beaches of Zanzibar

tipping.hotels: Tip porters USD 1-2 per bag and housekeeping USD 2-4 per day
tipping.guides: Tipping is an important part of safari and trekking experiences. Check the tipping guidelines from your tour operator
tipping.restaurants: It is customary to tip 5% where service charge isn't included
tipping.taxis: It is not customary to tip taxi drivers but if you want to provide a tip, offer 10% or extra change from the fare

weather.title: Tanzania has a varied climate due to its size and diverse topography. The coastal regions have a tropical climate with high temperatures and humidity year-round. Inland areas experience a more temperate climate, and the highland regions have a cooler climate

when_to_visit.title: Best for safari
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm, dry weather and less dense vegetation make it perfect for viewing wildlife. This period is famous for the Great Migration of wildebeest and other herbivores on the Serengeti plains

when_to_visit.title: Mountain hiking
when_to_visit.time_period: January to March, Dry season (June to October)
when_to_visit.short_description: Clearer skies, less rainfall and better visibility in the dry seasons for hiking Mount Kilimanjaro and Mount Meru

when_to_visit.title: Beach lovers
when_to_visit.time_period: Dry season (June to October), December to February
when_to_visit.short_description: Visit Zanzibar during the dry season for warm temperatures and lower humidity. A second short dry season in December to February is also a good opportunity to visit with fewer crowds

when_to_visit.title: Rainy season
when_to_visit.time_period: November to December, March to May
when_to_visit.short_description: Increased humidity and frequent rainfall. Tanzania's rainy season has a 'short rains' period from November and a 'long rains' period from March

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Tanzania depends on the region and activities you plan to engage in, but generally, the months of June to October offer pleasant temperatures, dry conditions, and excellent wildlife viewing opportunities in the national parks

short_description: A country of stunning architecture, art, and cuisine, France is a must-visit destination for any traveler. Take a stroll through the charming streets of Paris, discover the world-renowned vineyards of Bordeaux, and indulge in the delicious local cuisine

alcohol_info: France has no explicitly stated consumption age, but selling alcohol beverages to a minor (under 18) is prohibited and can be fined 7500 euros

tipping.hotels: Tip good service if you feel it's appropriate. Generally aim for ‚Ç¨1 per bag for porters, ‚Ç¨1-1.50 per day for housekeeping and ‚Ç¨8-20 for the concierge (depending on the hotel level)
tipping.guides: Usually, tour guides are tipped between ‚Ç¨2-5 after the excursion
tipping.restaurants: Tipping is not mandatory and service charge is always included. You may tip 10% additional for exceptional service
tipping.taxis: It is customary to tip your taxi driver 10%

weather.title: France has a varied climate due to its size and diverse geography. The northern regions have a temperate maritime climate with mild summers and cool winters, while the southern parts, including the Mediterranean coast, have a Mediterranean climate with hot summers and mild winters

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (April to June), Autumn (September to October)
when_to_visit.short_description: Milder temperatures and fewer tourists make spring and autumn great times to visit popular destinations like Paris, Provence and Normandy

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Long daylight hours and warmer temperatures bring many parts alive with festivals and events. Coastal areas will be popular during this period with tourists

when_to_visit.title: For winter sports
when_to_visit.short_description: Colder temperatures and shorter daylight hours. Excellent time for winter sports in the French Alps or festive activities

weather.best_time: The best time to visit France is during the spring months of April to June and the autumn months of September to October when the weather is generally pleasant, with mild temperatures and fewer crowds, allowing for enjoyable exploration of the country's cities, countryside, and cultural attractions

short_description: https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1580060839134-75a5edca2e99?q=80&w=2342&auto=format&fit=crop&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D
official_language: Afrikaans, English, Ndebele, Pedi, Sotho, Swazi, Tsonga, Tswana, Venda, Xhosa, Zulu

tipping.hotels: Tip 10-15 Rand per night for housekeeping and 10 Rand perbag for porters
tipping.guides: It's considered good etiquette to tip your guide 100 Rand per person per day or 10%
tipping.restaurants: It is customary to tip 10-15% of the bill. Gratuity may automatically be added for larger groups
tipping.taxis: Gratuity is not included in taxi fares so people generally tip 10%

weather.title: South Africa has a varied climate due to its size and diverse topography. The coastal regions have a Mediterranean climate, while the inland areas have a more temperate climate. The northeastern regions have a subtropical climate, and the western regions have a desert climate

when_to_visit.title: Best for safari
when_to_visit.short_description: Weather is cooler and the vegetation is less dense, making it easier to spot animals in national parks and game reserves. This season is off peak for tourists

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm to hot temperatures, particularly along coastal regions. Great for beach activities but expect more crowds during this period

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (September and October), Autumn (March and April)
when_to_visit.short_description: Shoulder seasons offer mild weather and lush landscapes

weather.best_time: The best time to visit South Africa depends on the region and activities you plan to engage in, but generally, the months of April to September offer milder temperatures, lower chances of rainfall, and better conditions for wildlife viewing and exploring national parks

short_description: From the romantic canals of Venice to the ancient ruins of Rome, Italy is a destination that has it all. Savor the rich flavors of Italian cuisine, sample world-renowned wines, and marvel at the stunning art and architecture. Don't miss the chance to explore the scenic countryside and charming villages

alcohol_info: Selling alcohol to those under the age of 18 in shops carries a fine between ‚Ç¨250 and ‚Ç¨1000

Serving alcohol beverages to those under the age of 16 is a criminal offense and is punished with prison up to one year, if the individual is 16 or 17 it will be treated as an offense that is fined between ‚Ç¨250 and ‚Ç¨1000

tipping.hotels: Tipping is not expected but for great service you can tip a nominal amount to staff
tipping.guides: Tipping guides ‚Ç¨5-10 euros depending on the tour length is apprecaited but not expected
tipping.restaurants: You are not expected to tip if service charge is included. f not you can round up the bill
tipping.taxis: In Italy you can tip your cab driver, but it isn't expected nor is it common

weather.title: Italy has a diverse climate due to its varied topography. The northern regions have a temperate climate with cold winters and hot summers, while the central and southern regions have a Mediterranean climate with mild, wet winters and hot, dry summers

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to October)
when_to_visit.short_description: Generally pleasant temperatures with less crowds than summer months. Perfect for exploring cities like Rome, Florence and Venice or seeing natural landscapes in changing colors like Tuscany

when_to_visit.title: Peak tourist season
when_to_visit.short_description: Can be hot and crowded in popular beach destinations like Amalfi Coast and Sicily. Northern regions like the Italian Alps will be milder in this period

when_to_visit.title: For winter sports
when_to_visit.short_description: Colder temperatures and snowfall in northern regions, attracting tourists to ski resorts. Central and southern regions will be milder

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Italy depends on the region, but generally, the months of April to June and September to October offer pleasant temperatures, fewer crowds, and beautiful landscapes

short_description: A land of diverse wildlife and breathtaking landscapes, Kenya is a destination that will leave you in awe. Embark on a safari in the Masai Mara, hike to the top of Mount Kenya, and relax on the pristine beaches of the coast. Don't forget to sample the delicious flavors of Kenyan cuisine, such as nyama choma and pilau

tipping.hotels: Tip porters 50-200 shillings and housekeeping 200-500 shillings per week
tipping.guides: If you go on a tour in Kenya, expect to tip your tour guide between 100-200 shillings per day, per person
tipping.restaurants: Leave 10% tip of the total bill when eating out in Kenya
tipping.taxis: Taxi drivers don't expect tips but rounding up to the nearest 100 shillings will be appreciated

weather.title: Kenya has a diverse climate due to its varying topography. The coastal regions have a tropical climate with high humidity, while the inland areas have a more temperate climate with cooler temperatures. It experiences two rainy seasons, the long rains from March to May and the short rains from October to December

when_to_visit.title: Great Migration
when_to_visit.short_description: Lower rainfall and generally sunny and warm weather, making it an ideal time for wildlife viewing. This period is particularly popular for the 'Great Migration', the annual wildebeest migration in the Maasai Mara National Reserve

when_to_visit.title: Off peak season
when_to_visit.short_description: Shoulder seasons offer a quieter time to visit with fewer tourists and lush landscapes

when_to_visit.title: Wet season
when_to_visit.time_period: April to June, October to December
when_to_visit.short_description: Be prepared for occasional rain showers and muddy conditions, especially in safari areas

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Kenya depends on the region, but generally, the months of January to March and July to October offer good wildlife viewing opportunities and pleasant weather for safaris

short_description: Formerly known as Burma, Myanmar is a land of ancient temples, breathtaking landscapes, and friendly locals. Marvel at the golden Shwedagon Pagoda in Yangon, take a hot air balloon ride over the temples of Bagan, and cruise down the Irrawaddy River to Mandalay

tipping.hotels: None
tipping.guides: None
tipping.restaurants: None
tipping.taxis: None

weather.title: Myanmar has a tropical monsoon climate with a wet and dry season. The wet season, from May to October, brings heavy rainfall, while the dry season, from November to April, is drier and cooler. Temperatures are generally high throughout the year

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.short_description: Pleasant temperatures, low humidity, and clear skies, making it ideal for exploring major cities like Yangon and Mandalay, temple hopping in Bagan or seeking retreat at Lake Inle

when_to_visit.title: Water festivals
when_to_visit.short_description: Temperatures soar during the hot and dry season, making outdoor activities challenging. This period is also the time for water festivals, particularly the famous Thingyan Water Festival in April, which offers a unique cultural experience

when_to_visit.title: Rainy season
when_to_visit.short_description: Frequent showers and high humidity, with some areas becoming inaccessible due to flooding. Still possible to visit during this period as showers are short-lived

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Myanmar depends on the region, but generally, the months of November to February offer milder temperatures, lower chances of rainfall, and better conditions for exploring cultural sites and natural landscapes

short_description: Experience the warmth and hospitality of the Colombian people, sample delicious cuisine, and explore the stunning natural landscapes of this beautiful country. From the vibrant cities of Bogota and Medellin to the pristine beaches of Cartagena, Colombia is a must- visit destination

alcohol_info: The law prohibits the sale of alcohol to a minor (anyone under the age of 18 years). It is not prohibited for minors to buy, attempt to buy or consume alcohol

tipping.hotels: Tip porters USD 1 per bag and housekeepng USD 2 per day
tipping.guides: Tipping tour guides is customary and 5-10% is a good benchmark
tipping.restaurants: Most restaurants include a 10% voluntary service charge (known as propina voluntaria). If you had exceptional sevice you can tip additional in cash
tipping.taxis: Taxis are metered and tipping is rare

weather.title: Colombia has a varied climate due to its diverse geography, but in general, it is characterized by warm and tropical conditions throughout the year in most regions. However, there are variations in temperature and rainfall depending on the elevation, with cooler temperatures in the higher mountainous areas

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.time_period: December to March, July to August
when_to_visit.short_description: Many regions experience lower rainfall and milder temperatures, making it pleasant weather to visit popular destinations like Bogota, Medellin, Cartagena and the Coffee Triangle. Expect crowds as this is peak tourist season

when_to_visit.title: Off peak season
when_to_visit.time_period: April to June, September to November
when_to_visit.short_description: Shoulder seasons offer travellers a chance to visit when crowds are smaller and the weather is still relatively pleasant in many regions. Be aware these periods have a higher chance of rainfall

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Colombia is during the dry season, which typically runs from December to March and July to August, when you can enjoy pleasant weather and fewer rainfall interruptions

short_description: Get swept up in the energy and vibrancy of South Korea, where ancient traditions meet modern culture, and delicious food is around every corner. Visit the ancient temples of Gyeongju, shop in the trendy district of Gangnam, or sample the street food in Myeong-dong

alcohol_info: The age limit for alcohol is 19 calculated by the year of birth. This means that an 18-year-old will be legally allowed to purchase and consume alcohol if they will be turning 19 that year

tipping.hotels: Tipping in hotels in South Korea is not common or expected by staff
tipping.guides: Tour guides will not expect a tip from tourists
tipping.restaurants: Tips are not expected at local restaurants but you can tip 5-10% in a western style venue
tipping.taxis: Taxi drivers don't expect tips but you can round up the fare as a kind gesture

weather.title: South Korea has a temperate climate with four distinct seasons. Summers are hot and humid, while winters can be cold with significant snowfall in some regions. Spring and autumn offer mild and pleasant weather

when_to_visit.title: Cherry blossom season
when_to_visit.short_description: Popular time with tourists coming to witness the stunning pink and white cherry blossoms across the country

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (April to June), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Comfortable temperatures with landscapes in changing colours

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Hot and humid, with rain showers due to monsoon season from larte June to mid July. Summer offers longer daylight hours and vibrant festivals such as the Boryeong Mud Festival and the Busan International Film Festival

when_to_visit.title: Best for winter sports
when_to_visit.short_description: Cold, particularly in mountainour regions. Excellent time to visit popular ski resorts such as Pyeongchang and Gangwon Province

weather.best_time: The best time to visit South Korea depends on the region and activities you plan to engage in, but generally, the spring months of April to June and the autumn months of September to November offer mild temperatures, beautiful cherry blossoms or fall foliage, and pleasant weather for outdoor exploration

short_description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure in Uganda, where majestic wildlife, stunning landscapes, and warm hospitality await. Go gorilla trekking in the Bwindi Impenetrable Forest, hike to the source of the Nile River, or relax on the shores of Lake Victoria

tipping.hotels: None
tipping.guides: None
tipping.restaurants: None
tipping.taxis: None

weather.title: Uganda has a tropical climate with high temperatures and humidity year-round. It experiences a wet season from March to May and from October to November, with heavy rainfall, while the dry seasons from December to February and from June to August offer drier conditions

when_to_visit.title: Best for safari
when_to_visit.time_period: December to February, June to September
when_to_visit.short_description: Favorable weather conditions with lower chances of rainfall. Vegetation is less dense, improving visibility for wildlife spotting in national parks such as Bwindi Impenetrable Forest, Queen Elizabeth National Park, and Murchison Falls National Park

when_to_visit.title: Wet season
when_to_visit.time_period: March to May, June to September
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher rainfall during this period and some areas may become inaccessible

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Uganda depends on the region and activities you plan to engage in, but generally, the months of December to February and June to September offer pleasant temperatures and excellent wildlife viewing opportunities

short_description: Discover the mysteries of the African desert in Sudan, where ancient pyramids, hospitable locals, and stunning landscapes beckon. Visit the pyramids of Meroe, explore the bustling souqs of Khartoum, or take a camel ride through the Nubian Desert

tipping.hotels: None
tipping.guides: None
tipping.restaurants: None
tipping.taxis: None

weather.title: Sudan has a desert and semi-arid climate with hot temperatures year-round. It experiences very little rainfall, and temperatures can reach extreme levels, particularly in the summer months

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: More moderate temperatures, making it suitable for outdoor activities and exploring historical sites like the pyramids of Meroe and the ancient city of Dongola

when_to_visit.title: Green season
when_to_visit.short_description: Heavy rainfall, particularly in southern and western parts of the country. Certain areas may be inaccesible during this rainy season

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Scorching temperatures make travel during this period difficult

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Sudan is from November to February when the weather is relatively cooler, and you can comfortably explore historical sites, enjoy desert expeditions, and experience the country's rich cultural heritage

short_description: Experience the vibrant, passionate culture of Spain, where tapas, flamenco, and fiestas are a way of life. Visit the architectural wonders of Gaudi in Barcelona, explore the narrow streets of Seville's Jewish Quarter, or catch a bullfight in Madrid

tipping.hotels: Tipping is mostly in high end hotels, at ‚Ç¨2-5 per day for housekeeping, ‚Ç¨5-10 for concierge and ‚Ç¨1-2 per bag for porters
tipping.guides: It is generally not expected to tip your tour guide, except for private tours where you should tip around ‚Ç¨20
tipping.restaurants: It's common practice to tip 10% in cash in restaurants, even if service charge is included
tipping.taxis: In Spain, it is common to tip 10%, or to round-up the fare

weather.title: Spain has a diverse climate due to its size and varied topography. The coastal regions have a Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters. Inland areas experience more continental climates, with hotter summers and colder winters

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (April to June), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild, pleasant weather with fewer crowds than the summer months. Excellent time to explore popular cities like Barcelona, Madrid, and Seville

when_to_visit.title: Best for beaches
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm temperatures and peak tourist season, particularly in coastal areas. Popular time for beach lovers and those seeking vibrant nightlife

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Coastal areas may experience milder temperatures whilst mountainout areas will see snowfall. Excellent time for winter sports enthusiasts to visit the ski resorts in the Pyrenees and Sierra Nevada mountains

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Spain depends on the region and activities you plan to engage in, but generally, the spring months of April to June and the autumn months of September to October offer pleasant temperatures, fewer crowds, and vibrant cultural events

short_description: From the cosmopolitan capital of Buenos Aires to the breathtaking landscapes of Patagonia, Argentina is a country of contrasts and wonders. Sample world- renowned wines, dance the tango, and experience the warm hospitality of the Argentine people

tipping.hotels: Tip porters 2-3 pesos per bag and maids a few pesos per day
tipping.guides: It's good etiquette to tip 10-20% for paid tours
tipping.restaurants: Tipping is not mandatory but 10% is sufficient if you enjoyed the service
tipping.taxis: Not required but many leave change and round up to the nearest peso

weather.title: Argentina has a diverse climate due to its vast size and varying topography. The country experiences everything from subtropical in the north to arid and temperate climates in the central regions, and subpolar in the southern areas, with a range of temperatures, precipitation patterns, and seasons

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (September to November), Autumn (March to May)
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild and pleasant temperatures make it perfect to explore Argentina's cities or beautiful national parks like Patagonia or Iguazu Falls

when_to_visit.title: Beach time
when_to_visit.short_description: Can be hot, particularly in northern regions. Popular time for beach destinations like Mar del Plata

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Colder temperatures in southern regions and the Andes are great for winter sports. City breaks in northern regions like Buenos Aires are still possible due to milder winters

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Argentina is during the spring and autumn seasons when the weather is mild, offering comfortable temperatures and fewer crowds, making it ideal for exploring diverse landscapes, cities, and cultural attractions

short_description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and diverse landscapes of Algeria, where bustling cities, picturesque villages, and the vast Sahara Desert await. Experience the warmth and hospitality of the Algerian people while sampling delicious North African cuisine

tipping.hotels: None
tipping.guides: None
tipping.restaurants: None
tipping.taxis: None

weather.title: Algeria has a diverse climate, with the coastal areas experiencing a Mediterranean climate characterized by mild, wet winters and hot, dry summers, while the interior and southern regions have a desert climate with extremely hot summers and cooler winters. The country also has mountainous regions where temperatures can be cooler and snowfall is possible in winter

when_to_visit.title: Desert exploration
when_to_visit.short_description: Comfortable temperatures perfect for exploring the Sahara Desert and the country's diverse landscapes

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild temperatures great for exploring cities and coastal areas

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Extremely hot and generally not recommended for tourism

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Not the best time for beach activities but can still be suitable for exploring cultural attractions

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Algeria is during the spring (March to May) and autumn (September to November) seasons when the weather is generally mild and pleasant, offering optimal conditions for exploring the country's diverse landscapes and cultural heritage

short_description: Home to some of the world's most breathtaking ancient sites, Iraq is a must- visit destination for history lovers. Explore the ruins of Babylon and marvel at the ancient architecture of the Erbil Citadel. Indulge in the rich flavors of Iraqi cuisine, such as lamb kebabs and spicy biryani

tipping.hotels: None
tipping.guides: None
tipping.restaurants: None
tipping.taxis: None

weather.title: Iraq has a hot desert climate characterized by extremely hot summers and mild winters. It experiences very little rainfall, and temperatures can reach scorching levels, particularly in the southern regions

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild and pleasant weather, with cooler temperatures than summer months. Perfect for exploring historical sites like Babylon and Erbil or enjoying natural attractions

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Extremely hot temperatures, espeically in southern parts of the country

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Cooler temperatures particularly in northern, mountainous regions. Some chance of rainfall and even snowfall

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Iraq is during the spring months of March to May and the autumn months of September to November when the weather is mild, and you can explore the country's historical sites comfortably

short_description: Discover the rugged beauty and fascinating history of Afghanistan, where ancient cities and stunning mountains are waiting to be explored. Meet friendly locals and learn about their culture while savoring delicious Afghan cuisine

tipping.hotels: None
tipping.guides: None
tipping.restaurants: None
tipping.taxis: None

weather.title: Afghanistan's climate is varied, with the majority of the country experiencing a continental climate characterized by hot summers and cold winters. The highlands and mountainous regions have a more alpine climate, with colder temperatures and significant snowfall in winter

when_to_visit.title: Mild and dry
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Pleasant temperatures perfect for sightseeing and outdoor activities

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Advisable to avoid visiting during summer due to high temperatures and occasional dust storms

when_to_visit.title: Snow lovers
when_to_visit.short_description: Temperatures drop below freezing, especially in mountainous areas

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Afghanistan is during the spring and autumn seasons when the weather is mild and pleasant, providing optimal conditions for exploring the country's natural beauty and cultural heritage

short_description: A country with a tumultuous past, Poland has emerged as a vibrant destination for culture, history, and food. Visit the charming old town of Krakow, tour the sobering Auschwitz-Birkenau Memorial, or indulge in pierogi and vodka

alcohol_info: Drinking in public places, with the exception of designated drinking zones, is prohibited regardless of age

tipping.hotels: Tipping for good service is not obligatory in Poland but 10PLN per night would be considered a sign of good service
tipping.guides: If the tour guide was great, it's customary to tip 10-15%
tipping.restaurants: Tipping is expected in restaurants between 10-15%
tipping.taxis: Tipping etiquette is 10% if the taxi is on time but don't feel obliged

weather.title: Poland has a temperate climate with moderately cold winters and mild summers. It experiences moderate rainfall throughout the year, with the highest precipitation occurring during the summer months

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Most favorable weather conditions with mild to warm temperatures and longer daylight hours. This is peak tourist season especially in popular destinations such as Krakow, Warsaw, Gdansk, and Zakopane

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (April to May), Autumn (September to October)
when_to_visit.short_description: Great time to visit for milder temperatures and fewer crowds. Witness the blossoming of flowers in spring or the beautiful fall foliage in autumn across Poland's natural landscapes

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Cold temperatures, particularly in the northern and eastern parts of the country. Perfect time for winter sports in the Tatra Mountains or visiting festive markets

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Poland is from May to September when you can enjoy mild temperatures, longer daylight hours, and various cultural events and festivals held throughout the country

short_description: Experience the beauty and hospitality of Canada, a country that is famous for its stunning natural landscapes, diverse culture, and friendly people. From the Rocky Mountains to the bustling cities of Toronto and Vancouver, there is something for everyone in Canada

alcohol_info: In Alberta no person may give or sell or permit any person to give or sell liquor to a minor in licensed premises

In Manitoba a person must not give, sell or otherwise supply liquor to a minor. The law provides exceptions for a doctor, dentist, pharmacist or other health care professional for medical purposes; for sacramental purposes and by the parent, guardian, spouse or common-law partner, if it is given or supplied in a residence
In Quebec the law prohibits the sale of alcohol beverages to a minor under the age of 18 years

Ontario's Liquor Licence Act permits the supply and consumption of liquor to those under the age the of 19. However, supplying a person under age of 19 is restricted to the person's parent or legal guardian, and may only occur in a residence or in a private place of the parent or legal guardian

tipping.hotels: Hotels generally expect tips. Tip porters CAD 1-2 per bag and housekeepng CAD 2-5 per day
tipping.guides: Show appreciation to your guide; 10-15% is considered normal
tipping.restaurants: Tipping is expected at around 15-20% of the bill
tipping.taxis: Tipping drivers 10% of the fare is common

weather.title: Canada has a diverse climate, but it is generally characterized by cold winters and warm summers. The northern regions experience long, harsh winters, while the southern parts have milder temperatures and more distinct seasons

when_to_visit.title: Off peak seaoson
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Milder temperatures and changing landscapes make it a perfect time to visit without the crowds

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Perfect for outdoor activities including Canada's national parks like Banff and Niagara Falls. Note that summer in the eastern provinces will have warmer summers than British Columbia

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Ideal for winter sports and experiencing winter festivals in regions like Whistler, Quebec City and Ottawa

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Canada depends on the region, but generally, the summer months of June to August offer pleasant weather and a wide range of outdoor activities, while the fall season (September to October) showcases stunning foliage colors

short_description: With its vibrant markets, colorful architecture, and delicious cuisine, Morocco is a feast for the senses. Take a camel ride through the Sahara desert, wander through the narrow alleyways of Marrakech's medina, and indulge in a cup of sweet mint tea

tipping.hotels: Tip the porter 10-20 dirhams and housekeeping 20 dirhams per day
tipping.guides: Most organized tours do not require a tip and for unofficial guides offer maximum 10 dirhams as a thanks
tipping.restaurants: Meals are generally inexpensive so add 10-15% to your bull and/or 20-30 dirhams on the table in cash to show appreciation
tipping.taxis: Most taxi drivers appreciate you rounding up the fare

weather.title: Morocco has a diverse climate due to its varying geography. The coastal regions have a Mediterranean climate with mild, wet winters and hot, dry summers. Inland areas experience a more desert-like climate with hot temperatures and little rainfall

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (April to May), Autumn (September to October)
when_to_visit.short_description: Generally sunny with fewer crowds and mild temperatures. Perfect for hiking the Atlas Mountains or visiting famous cities like Marrakech, Fez and Chefchaouen. Sea temperatures will still be warm in this period

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher temperatures, especially in the interior and desert regions. Coastal areas like Casablanca and Essaouira provide some relief with cooler sea breezes but they will be crowded during this time

when_to_visit.title: Winter sun
when_to_visit.short_description: Cooler temperatures, particularly in the mountains and desert regions. Coastal areas and cities like Marrakech still have relatively mild temperatures, making it a popular destination for winter sun seekers. The Atlas Mountains offer opportunities for winter sports like skiing

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Morocco depends on the region, but generally, the spring months of March to May and the autumn months of September to November offer milder temperatures and comfortable weather for exploring the country's diverse landscapes and cities

short_description: A land of contrasts, from the glittering modern cities to the ancient desert landscapes. Visit the holy city of Mecca, explore the ancient ruins of Madain Saleh, or experience the bustling markets and lively culture of Riyadh

alcohol_info: Drinking or possessing alcohol is prohibited in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Persons who drink or possess alcohol are subject to arrest and trial

tipping.hotels: It is common to tip for indivudual services despite service charge. Tip USD 1-2 for the porter and USD 2 per day for housekeeping
tipping.guides: Tip USD 10 per person for smaller groups and USD 5 per person for larger groups
tipping.restaurants: In Saudi Arabia tipping is expected to be between 10% and 15% for good service, unless there is a service charge added to the bill
tipping.taxis: In Saudi Arabia it is customary to tip driver up to 10% your taxi

weather.title: Saudi Arabia has a desert climate with extremely hot summers and mild winters. It experiences very little rainfall, and temperatures can reach scorching levels, particularly in the summer months

when_to_visit.title: Best for Red Sea
when_to_visit.short_description: Comfortable, warm temperatures perfect for enjoying Red Sea beaches and water sports

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Moderate warm temperatures with less fluctuation between day and night in desert areas. Great to visiting main cities and enjoying natural areas

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Extremely hot throughout most parts of Saudi Arabia. Outdoor activitiers will be difficult during this period

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Saudi Arabia depends on the region, but generally, the months of October to April offer milder temperatures, making it more comfortable to explore the country's historical sites and natural wonders

short_description: Explore the rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine of Ukraine, where a blend of Slavic, Jewish, and European influences come together. Visit the ancient city of Lviv, indulge in the local dumplings called varenyky, or marvel at the stunning architecture of Kyiv

tipping.hotels: Tipping in hotels is appreciated but not expected beyond leaving your change
tipping.guides: In Ukraine you can tip your tour guide the equivalent of USD 15-20 per day per person, if you receive good service
tipping.restaurants: Tipping isn't part of the culture but if you wish to, aim for 10% of the bill
tipping.taxis: Taxi drivers don't expect tips but you can round up the fare as a kind gesture

weather.title: Ukraine has a temperate-continental climate with hot summers and cold winters. It experiences moderate rainfall throughout the year, with the highest precipitation occurring during the summer months

when_to_visit.title: Sightseeing
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Milder temperatures with landscapes in full color. Great time to explore historical sites and visit destinations like Kyiv and Lviv

when_to_visit.title: For wine lovers
when_to_visit.short_description: With the landscapes in vibrant fall colours, visit vineyards in the regions of Crimea and Odessa

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Hot temperatures, particularly in the southern regions. Popular time for Black Sea coastal resorts and activities in the Carpathian Mountains

when_to_visit.title: üå®Ô∏è
when_to_visit.short_description: Cold temperatures, often below freezing in northern and eastern parts of the country. Good time to experience Ukrainian winter traditions, enjoy winter sports in the Carpathian Mountains, and explore the festive atmosphere during the holiday season

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Ukraine is from May to September when you can enjoy mild temperatures, longer daylight hours, and various cultural events and festivals held throughout the country.
